TableConfigs.name: Users
TableConfigs.createCommand: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Users (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,Name TEXT UNIQUE NOT NULL,Email TEXT, PhoneNumber TEXT, Rfid TEXT UNIQUE, Type INTEGER, HashedPassword TEXT NOT NULL);

TableConfigs.name: TagMarks
TableConfigs.createCommand: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS TagMarks (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, UserId INTEGER NOT NULL, Location TEXT NOT NULL, timestamp DATETIME NOT NULL);
